content: On the other end of the tunnel, the path will open up into a large interior valley with the sun streaming down on the left. Stick to the right side for now, and you’ll find a large door that can’t be opened from this side.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Despair'.
The content is as follows:
On the other end of the tunnel, the path will open up into a large interior valley with the sun streaming down on the left. Stick to the right side for now, and you’ll find a large door that can’t be opened from this side.
